example[1]: You can buy clothes like these anywhere.
example[2]: I don’t want to live in London, but I’d be happy living anywhere else.
example[3]: Do you need anywhere to stay for the night?
example[4]: Did you go anywhere exotic on vacation this year?
example[5]: Have you been anywhere else in Spain?
definition[2]: used in negative sentences to mean no place
example[6]: I can’t find my passport anywhere.
